member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.CopyPalette
member.param: An to which the decoder's global palette is to be copied. Use to create the destination palette before calling CopyPalette.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.GetColorContexts
member.summary: Retrieves the objects of the image.

param.name: cCount
param.para: The number of color contexts to retrieve.
This value must be the size of, or smaller than, the size available to ppIColorContexts.

member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to the .
A pointer that receives the number of color contexts contained in the image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.GetContainerFormat
member.param: A pointer that receives the image's container format GUID.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.GetDecoderInfo
member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to an .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.GetFrame
member.summary: Retrieves the specified frame of the image.
member.param: A pointer that receives a pointer to the .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.GetFrameCount
member.summary: Retrieves the total number of frames in the image.
member.param: A pointer that receives the total number of frames in the image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.GetMetadataQueryReader
member.summary: Retrieves the metadata query reader from the decoder.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the decoder's .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.GetPreview
member.summary: Retrieves a preview image, if supported.
member.param: Receives a pointer to the preview bitmap if supported.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.GetThumbnail
member.summary: Retrieves a bitmap thumbnail of the image, if one exists
member.param: Receives a pointer to the of the thumbnail.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the decoder with the provided stream.

param.name: pIStream
param.para: The stream to use for initialization.
The stream contains the encoded pixels which are decoded each time the method on the interface (see ) is invoked.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapDecoder.QueryCapability
member.summary: Retrieves the capabilities of the decoder based on the specified stream.
member.param: The stream to retrieve the decoder capabilities from.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that represent a decoder.
The interface provides access to the decoder's properties such as global thumbnails (if supported), frames, and palette.
